body:
Redeemer, their Maker, is their husband; they are flesh of his but also redemption.vitally united to him, their Head, by a living faith; their there is an eternal, indissoluble connection between these those blessings flow, that the elect of God partake of in Jesus, say then, why not unto me? Has Christ but one blessing? ‘who of God is made unto us', etc.persecutor, to you Corinthians, who were 'unclean, drunkards, Apostle's preaching foolishness.already received are only the first-fruits, like the cluster of 
Ned Carroll
